name: Saldor
headline: AI Software Engineers

founders.name: Jacob Bland, Cofounder, CEO
founders.description: Cofounder and CEO at Saldor. Priorly product manager and tech lead at Crusoe Cloud. Before that, on the data team at Square.

founders.name: Jack Cameron, Founder/CTO
founders.description: Cofounder and CTO at Saldor. Previously at Crusoe Energy building storage solutions for Crusoe Cloud.

generated_description:
**Saldor: The Future of Software Engineering**

Founded in 2024 and currently part of Y Combinator's Batch S24, Saldor is a promising startup based in San Francisco that’s setting a new standard for software development. At its core, Saldor aims to revolutionize coding with the help of AI software engineers, essentially positioning itself as your very own asynchronous software engineering assistant.

### What Does Saldor Do?

Saldor is all about speeding up the software development process. Imagine having a virtual army of AI developers who can handle everything from migrating legacy codebases to automating test writing and deploying new features. The pitch? You can simply say, “Hey Saldor, please migrate our billing repository to the latest Java version,” and voilà—your request is in motion.

### Key Features

1. **Eliminate Technical Debt**: Transition old code to new standards without breaking a sweat.
2. **Automate Test Writing**: Increase code coverage and improve quality with automated tests.
3. **Ship New Features**: Input product requirements and let Saldor implement them into your existing projects.
4. **Unblock Your Engineering Team**: Free talent to tackle the more exciting aspects of development while Saldor handles the mundane.
5. **Integration Simplicity**: It fits seamlessly into existing source code and project management tools, eliminating any learning curves.

### Pricing Structure

Saldor offers straightforward pricing, making it accessible for teams of all sizes:

- **Startup Plan**: $200/month for small teams (1 agent).
- **Business Plan**: $500/month for mid-sized teams (3 agents).
- **Enterprise Plan**: Custom pricing for large organizations, with unlimited agents and tailored options.

This means you can choose a plan that fits your team’s scale without worrying about hidden costs associated with usage.

### Team Behind Saldor

With a compact team of just two employees and guidance from Group Partner Diana Hu, Saldor is agile and ready to innovate. Their focus on generative AI highlights the commitment to leading the industry’s shift towards more intelligent, automated software solutions.

### Wrap-Up

If you're eager to enhance your software development experience, Saldor is inviting you to start a free trial and see the efficiency their platform can offer. Go ahead and book a demo to witness its capabilities firsthand. For more details, visit their [official website](https://saldor.com/) to learn more about how they can help you ship code faster. 

In a world where technical debt can be suffocating and time is of the essence, Saldor is positioning itself as the solution that not only promises improvement but delivers it in a format that fits seamlessly into your workflow. 

So, why wait? Embrace the future of coding with Saldor!
